#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    char arr[200005],arr1[200005];
	    cin>>arr>>arr1;
	    int count=strlen(arr),count2=strlen(arr1);
	    int flag=0,s=0,index=-1;
	    if(count-count2!=1)
	    {
	        cout<<"0"<<endl;
	    }
	    else
	    {
	        for(int i=0;i<count;i++)
	        {
	            if(arr[i]!=arr1[i])
	            {
	                s=1;
	                index=i;
	                break;
	            }
	        }
	        for(int i=index+1;i<count&&s==1;i++)
	        {
	            if(arr[i]!=arr1[i-1])
	            {
	                flag=1;
	                break;
	            }
	        }
	        if(flag==0)
	        {
	            cout<<"1"<<endl;
	        }
	        else
	        {
	            cout<<"0"<<endl;
	        }
	    }
	    
	}
	return 0;
}
